title: Keycloak Admin Client does not work when create user
body:
### Describe the bug

Im using next dependency in Maven: 

```xml
<dependency>
            <groupId>org.keycloak</groupId>
            <artifactId>keycloak-admin-client</artifactId>
            <version>21.0.1</version>
 </dependency>
```

My keycloak configuration is the next one: 

```java
  keycloak = KeycloakBuilder.builder()
                    .serverUrl(serverUrl)
                    .realm(realm)
                    .grantType(OAuth2Constants.PASSWORD)
                    .username(userName)
                    .password(password)
                    .clientId(clientId)
                    .clientSecret(clientSecret)
                    .build();
```
                    
                    
And the service is that one:

```java
    public Response addUser(UserKeycloakRequest userKeycloakRequest) {

        CredentialRepresentation userCredentialRepresentation = new CredentialRepresentation();
        userCredentialRepresentation.setType(CredentialRepresentation.PASSWORD);
        userCredentialRepresentation.setTemporary(false);
        userCredentialRepresentation.setValue(userKeycloakRequest.getPassword());


        UserRepresentation user = new UserRepresentation();
        user.setFirstName(userKeycloakRequest.getName());
        user.setUsername(userKeycloakRequest.getEmail());
        user.setEmail(userKeycloakRequest.getEmail());
        user.setCredentials(Arrays.asList(userCredentialRepresentation));
        user.setEnabled(true);
        user.setEmailVerified(true);

        UsersResource usersResource = KeycloakConfig.getInstance().realms().realm("MeetMeStream").users();
        return usersResource.create(user);

    }
```

When I try to create a new user, using this, returns me the following error:

```posh
com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.exc.InvalidDefinitionException: No serializer found for class org.jboss.resteasy.specimpl.AbstractBuiltResponse$InputStreamWrapper and no properties discovered to create BeanSerializer (to avoid exception, disable SerializationFeature.FAIL_ON_EMPTY_BEANS) (through reference chain: org.jboss.resteasy.client.jaxrs.engines.ApacheHttpClient4Engine$1["entity"])
```
